metadata.synopsis: A philosophy professor is investigating the sudden demise of one of his students, who had mental problems.

reviews: Ten Days' Wonder suffers from an excess of style and a deficiency of wonder.
It's unfortunate that the unevenness of the motion picture makes such attention a dubious blessing.
It's a minor masterwork of freakazoidal cinema.
Creative adaptation of the Ellery Queen mystery.
This unique film is both awkward and mesmerizing.
